description: Variation of Condition 1 of planning permission dated 1 March 2024 (RN 23/08416/FULL) for: "Removal of the existing mansard roof and roof top plant and erection of a new double pitched mansard roof and roof top plant; alterations to existing external public access from Belgrave Place including the removal of external platform lift and stairs and construction of new entrance gate, bridge across lightwell and entrance door in raised side wall; enclosed platform lift in rear terrace;  external lighting; and replacement windows." NAMELY, new step and omission of vent to Ground Floor Rear Terrace; landscaping alterations to Consulate Entrance and Rear Terrace; alterations to external door to Lift Lobby; additional surface-mounted down lights and CCTV; replacement and relocation of Fourth Floor condenser unit, additional rainwater pipe and changes to external rainwater drainage; position of consented roof plant adjusted; new up-lights to facade; drivers for external lighting; and alterations to consented RCPs.
